Name: ag-table ColumnDef
Body: {%- capture kebabName %}{{ model.Table.Name | KebabCase | Singular }}{% endcapture -%}
{%- capture className %}{{ model.Table.Name | UpperCamel | Singular }}{% endcapture -%}
{%- capture propertyName %}{{ model.Table.Name | LowerCamel | Singular  }}{% endcapture -%}
const columnDefs = [{% for prop in model.Table.Columns -%}{%- capture dataType -%}{{ prop.DataType | CSharp }}{%- endcapture -%}
{%- capture fieldName -%}{{ prop.Name | LowerCamel | Singular }}{%- endcapture %}
{ headerName: "{{ fieldName | Words}}", field: "{{ fieldName }}", width: 70, type: "dateColumn", filter: "agDateColumnFilter" },
{ headerName: "{{ fieldName | Words}}", field: "{{ fieldName }}", width: 120 },
{ headerName: "{{ fieldName | Words}}", field: "{{ fieldName }}", type: "numericColumn", width: 80, filter: "agNumberColumnFilter"},
{ headerName: "{{ fieldName | Words}}", field: "{{ fieldName }}", width: 100 },
{%- for relatedColumn in relation.ViewModelColumns-%}{%- capture dataType -%}{{ relatedColumn.DataType | CSharp }}{%- endcapture -%}
{%- capture fieldName -%}{{ relatedColumn.PropertyName  | LowerCamel | Singular }}{%- endcapture -%}
{ headerName: "{{ fieldName | Words}}", field: "{{ fieldName }}", width: 70, type: "dateColumn", filter: "agDateColumnFilter" },
{ headerName: "{{ fieldName | Words}}", field: "{{ fieldName }}", width: 120 },
{ headerName: "{{ fieldName | Words}}", field: "{{ fieldName }}", type: "numericColumn", width: 80, filter: "agNumberColumnFilter"},
{ headerName: "{{ fieldName | Words}}", field: "{{ fieldName }}", width: 100 },
